com.espertech.esper.eeutil.client.metric

Class MetricClientOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.espertech.esper.eeutil.client.metric.MetricClientOptions

  • public class MetricClientOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Metric options control the level of detail reported and the flavor of memory use reporting.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MetricClientOptions() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MetricClientOptions allDetail()
      Returns an options object initialized for reporting at the highest level of detail.
      boolean isDataWindowContainedDetail()
      Returns indicator whether for each data window that contains other data windows, such as the grouped, intersection or union data windows a list item for each individual data window should be reported.
      boolean isGroupByAggregationPerGroupDetail()
      Returns indicator whether for each group-by clause the metric service will report a list of group keys plus metrics for each group (false by default).
      boolean isMatchRecognizeStateAndPartitionDetail()
      Returns indicator whether for each match-recognize partition the metric service will report a list of partition keys plus metrics for each partition (false by default).
      boolean isMeasureMemoryForEvents()
      Returns indicator whether when measuring memory the engine should include events (true, the default) or should not include events in the memory measurement (set to false).
      boolean isPatternEveryDistinctDetail()
      Returns indicator whether for each every-distinct in a pattern the metric service will report the number of distinct keys for each such subexpression instance (false by default).
      boolean isPatternSubexpressionCountDetail()
      Returns indicator whether for each pattern subexpression specified the metric service will report a the subexpression in a list of subexpressions and metrics for each subexpression (false by default).
      boolean isReportMemoryUse()
      Returns indicator whether memory use reporting is turned on.
      boolean isTableRowDetail()
      Returns an indicator whether for each table row in a table the metric service will report the keys and information for each row(false by default).
      void setDataWindowContainedDetail(boolean dataWindowContainedDetail)
      Sets indicator whether for each data window that contains other data windows, such as the grouped, intersection or union data windows a list item for each individual data window should be reported.
      void setGroupByAggregationPerGroupDetail(boolean groupByAggregationPerGroupDetail)
      Sets and indicator whether for each group-by clause the metric service will report a list of group keys plus metrics for each group (false by default).
      void setMatchRecognizeStateAndPartitionDetail(boolean matchRecognizeStateAndPartitionDetail)
      Sets indicator whether for each match-recognize partition the metric service will report a list of partition keys plus metrics for each partition (false by default).
      void setMeasureMemoryForEvents(boolean measureMemoryForEvents)
      Sets indicator whether when measuring memory the engine should include events (true, the default) or should not include events in the memory measurement (set to false).
      void setPatternEveryDistinctDetail(boolean patternEveryDistinctDetail)
      Sets an indicator whether for each every-distinct in a pattern the metric service will report the number of distinct keys for each such subexpression instance (false by default).
      void setPatternSubexpressionCountDetail(boolean patternSubexpressionCountDetail)
      Sets indicator whether for each pattern subexpression specified the metric service will report the subexpression in a list of subexpressions and metrics for each subexpression (false by default).
      void setReportMemoryUse(boolean reportMemoryUse)
      Sets indicator whether memory use reporting is turned on.
      void setTableRowDetail(boolean tableRowDetail)
      Sets an indicator whether for each table row in a table the metric service will report the keys and information for each row(false by default).

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • allDetail

        public static MetricClientOptions allDetail()
        Returns an options object initialized for reporting at the highest level of detail.
        Returns:
        options object

      • isDataWindowContainedDetail

        public boolean isDataWindowContainedDetail()
        Returns indicator whether for each data window that contains other data windows, such as the grouped, intersection or union data windows a list item for each individual data window should be reported.
        Returns:
        indicator whether contained-therein data windows are detailed out

      • setDataWindowContainedDetail

        public void setDataWindowContainedDetail(boolean dataWindowContainedDetail)
        Sets indicator whether for each data window that contains other data windows, such as the grouped, intersection or union data windows a list item for each individual data window should be reported.
        Parameters:
        dataWindowContainedDetail - indicator whether contained-therein data windows are detailed out

      • isReportMemoryUse

        public boolean isReportMemoryUse()
        Returns indicator whether memory use reporting is turned on. By default it is turned on however requires a Java agent in the Java application command line as documented. If false the metrics services will not report memory use.

        Use the method MetricClient.isMemoryMeasurementEnabled() to determine whether the agent is installed and memory can be measured.

        Returns:
        indicator whether memory use will be reported

      • setReportMemoryUse

        public void setReportMemoryUse(boolean reportMemoryUse)
        Sets indicator whether memory use reporting is turned on.
        Parameters:
        reportMemoryUse - indicator whether memory use will be reported

      • isGroupByAggregationPerGroupDetail

        public boolean isGroupByAggregationPerGroupDetail()
        Returns indicator whether for each group-by clause the metric service will report a list of group keys plus metrics for each group (false by default).
        Returns:
        indicator whether to include group-by per-group detail

      • setGroupByAggregationPerGroupDetail

        public void setGroupByAggregationPerGroupDetail(boolean groupByAggregationPerGroupDetail)
        Sets and indicator whether for each group-by clause the metric service will report a list of group keys plus metrics for each group (false by default).
        Parameters:
        groupByAggregationPerGroupDetail - indicator whether to include group-by per-group detail

      • isMatchRecognizeStateAndPartitionDetail

        public boolean isMatchRecognizeStateAndPartitionDetail()
        Returns indicator whether for each match-recognize partition the metric service will report a list of partition keys plus metrics for each partition (false by default).
        Returns:
        indicator whether to include match-recognize per-partition detail

      • setMatchRecognizeStateAndPartitionDetail

        public void setMatchRecognizeStateAndPartitionDetail(boolean matchRecognizeStateAndPartitionDetail)
        Sets indicator whether for each match-recognize partition the metric service will report a list of partition keys plus metrics for each partition (false by default).
        Parameters:
        matchRecognizeStateAndPartitionDetail - indicator whether to include match-recognize per-partition detail

      • isPatternSubexpressionCountDetail

        public boolean isPatternSubexpressionCountDetail()
        Returns indicator whether for each pattern subexpression specified the metric service will report a the subexpression in a list of subexpressions and metrics for each subexpression (false by default).
        Returns:
        indicator whether to include pattern subexpression metrics

      • setPatternSubexpressionCountDetail

        public void setPatternSubexpressionCountDetail(boolean patternSubexpressionCountDetail)
        Sets indicator whether for each pattern subexpression specified the metric service will report the subexpression in a list of subexpressions and metrics for each subexpression (false by default).
        Parameters:
        patternSubexpressionCountDetail - indicator whether to include pattern subexpression metrics

      • isPatternEveryDistinctDetail

        public boolean isPatternEveryDistinctDetail()
        Returns indicator whether for each every-distinct in a pattern the metric service will report the number of distinct keys for each such subexpression instance (false by default).
        Returns:
        indicator whether to include pattern every-distinct metrics

      • setPatternEveryDistinctDetail

        public void setPatternEveryDistinctDetail(boolean patternEveryDistinctDetail)
        Sets an indicator whether for each every-distinct in a pattern the metric service will report the number of distinct keys for each such subexpression instance (false by default).
        Parameters:
        patternEveryDistinctDetail - indicator whether to include pattern every-distinct metrics

      • isMeasureMemoryForEvents

        public boolean isMeasureMemoryForEvents()
        Returns indicator whether when measuring memory the engine should include events (true, the default) or should not include events in the memory measurement (set to false).
        Returns:
        indicator whether to measure memory for event objects

      • setMeasureMemoryForEvents

        public void setMeasureMemoryForEvents(boolean measureMemoryForEvents)
        Sets indicator whether when measuring memory the engine should include events (true, the default) or should not include events in the memory measurement (set to false).
        Parameters:
        measureMemoryForEvents - indicator whether to measure memory for event objects

      • isTableRowDetail

        public boolean isTableRowDetail()
        Returns an indicator whether for each table row in a table the metric service will report the keys and information for each row(false by default).
        Returns:
        indicator whether to include table per-row metrics

      • setTableRowDetail

        public void setTableRowDetail(boolean tableRowDetail)
        Sets an indicator whether for each table row in a table the metric service will report the keys and information for each row(false by default).
        Parameters:
        tableRowDetail - indicator whether to include table per-row metrics
